article_metadata.description: Although Pence claims he received unprecedented concessions from the federal government, those concessions are little more than window dressing on a new welfare entitlement for able-bodied, working-age adults. Worse yet, many of the “concessions” are far less than advertised.
article_metadata.author: The Apothecary

og.description: Although Pence claims he received unprecedented concessions from the federal government, those concessions are little more than window dressing on a new welfare entitlement for able-bodied, working-age adults. Worse yet, many of the “concessions” are far less than advertised.
og.title: Mike Pence's Obamacare Medicaid Expansion: Reading Between The Lines
